trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering"> </xref> hendelse av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs class is used to pass data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event handler of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs brukes til å sende data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs.ParameterValues%2A> property provides access to the filter parameter values before the filtering operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs.ParameterValues%2A>egenskapen gir tilgang til parameteren filterverdiene før filtrering operasjonen utføres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs.ParameterValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>metoden ved å angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs>til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Filtering is supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value.
trans-unit.target: Filtrering støttes når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The parameters in the `parameterValues` collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method runs.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne i det `parameterValues` samlingen er knyttet til parametere som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>egenskapen når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Select%2A>metoden kjører.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object that provides access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objektet som gir tilgang til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref> objekter av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs> class is used to pass data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event handler of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs>Klassen brukes til å sende data til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>hendelsesbehandlingen for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The ParameterValues property provides access to the filter parameter values before the filtering operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ParameterValues gir tilgang til parameteren filterverdiene før filtrering operasjonen utføres.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You should validate any filter parameter values that you receive from the client and cancel the select operation if there are invalid parameters.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Bør du validere parameterverdier filteret du mottar fra klienten og avbryte operasjonen select Hvis det ikke er ugyldige parametere.

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the result of the select method.
trans-unit.target: Kjøretiden ganske enkelt inn parameterverdien i filteruttrykket og gjelder for resultatet av select-metoden.

trans-unit.source: It is possible for compromised values to alter the filter expression in such a way as to reveal more rows than might otherwise be visible to the client.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig for kompromittert verdier for å endre filteruttrykket slik til å vise flere rader enn kan ellers være synlig for klienten.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>egenskapen som et sikkerhetstiltak å begrense antall elementer som returneres, må du validere parameterverdiene før filtreringen forekommer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>
